description: As the prime minister of Neo Hong Kong, Wong Yunfat has ruled the world for the past four years, thanks to Master Asia`s victory in the 12th Gundam Fight. By the rules of the Gundam Fight, the previous winner plays host to the final phase of the next tournament, and so the finals of the 13th Gundam Fight are to take place in Neo Hong Kong under his personal supervision. Eager to cling to power, the scheming Wong is fully prepared to bend the rules of the contest in order to bring about the outcome he desires.
name: Wong Yunfat
